rules.text: Projects must reforest degraded lands in the Andean region using native species.
Baseline scenario assumes continuation of pre-project grazing without tree planting.
The project boundary encompasses all reforested parcels and nurseries.
Carbon pools include above-ground biomass, below-ground biomass, litter, dead wood, and soil organic carbon.
SOC changes are conservatively excluded unless site-specific data are available.
Leakage from displaced grazing is quantified using default emission factors.
Project proponents shall monitor tree survival, growth, and leakage parameters annually.
Apply a Â±10% deduction to net removals to account for uncertainty.
